messages:
Name: Matías Kranevitter
Nationality: Argentina
Date of Birth: May 21, 1993
Position: Midfielder
Current club: River Plate
Liga Profesional Argentina clubs played for: River Plate

Midfielder Matías Kranevitter plays for River Plate and hasn't been involved in many of the side's Liga Profesional Argentina matches in 2025, making four appearances overall and accumulating 197 minutes of playing time. He has started in two of these appearances across their 25 fixtures and been used off the bench on two occasions.
Kranevitter last appeared in a Liga Profesional Argentina game on March 9, playing 90 minutes for River Plate against Atlético Tucumán in a 1-0 win. He has been shown one yellow card.
River Plate head to Estudiantes on September 13 the next time the side are in Liga Profesional Argentina action.
Kranevitter played 17 Liga Profesional Argentina games last season for River Plate.
Before moving to River Plate in December 2022, Kranevitter made 90 league appearances in total at Monterrey, scoring one goal and providing two assists.
